short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily calculate the time elapsed between a selected date and today, directly from your browser!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Date Difference Calculator is a handy Chrome extension that enables you to quickly calculate the time elapsed between a date you select on a webpage and the current date.

Whether you are tracking project deadlines, counting down to special events, or just curious about the number of days passed since a specific date, this extension makes it simple and convenient.

Please note: This extension aims to support a wide range of date formats, but some formats might not be recognized. If you encounter any issues, please contact us for support.

Boost your productivity with the Date Difference Calculator, the quickest and easiest way to calculate date differences directly in your browser!
